attributes.title: Big orange Cheeto puff❤️✨🧚‍♂️😏

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS AND A TERRIBLE PRESIDENT

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 😡
attributes.review: i gave this app 1 star because when i opened it, the app immediately kicked me out and wouldn’t stop, it kept crashing. but when i finally got in, I SAW A BUNCH OF PICTURES OF MOMO, AND IT SCARED THE CRAP OUT OF MY 5 YEAR OLD SISTER STANDING BEHIND ME. and i KNOW this isn’t a virus on my phone because i have a vpn and a antivirus system on my phone. NEXT TIME WHEN YOU MAKE A HORROR GAME ANNOUNCE IT!
